languages.text: "Перед вами Лорд-капитан {name} фон Валанциус, владетель{mf||ница} корабля и всего, что на нем находится — включая добро, которое вы трогаете своими немытыми руками, а также ваши жалкие жизни".

traits.locale_text: "Перед вами Лорд-капитан {name} фон Валанциус, владетель{mf||ница} корабля и всего, что на нем находится — включая ящик, в который вы запустили свои немытые руки, и ваши жалкие жизни".

languages.text: "Before you stands Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel and everything on it, including those goods you are pawing at with your unwashed hands, and your miserable lives as well."
languages.original_text: "Перед вами Лорд-капитан {name} фон Валанциус, владетель{mf||ница} корабля и всего, что на нем находится — включая добро, которое вы трогаете своими немытыми руками, а также ваши жалкие жизни".

traits.locale_text: "Before you stands Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel and everything on it, including those goods you are pawing at with your unwashed hands, and your miserable lives as well."

"Before you stands Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel and everything on it, including those goods you are pawing at with your unwashed hands, and your miserable lives as well."

"Before you stands Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel and everything on it, including those goods you are pawing at with your unwashed hands, and your miserable lives as well."

"Before you stands Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel and everything on it, including those goods you are pawing at with your unwashed hands, and your miserable lives as well."

"Before you stands Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel and everything on it, including those goods you are pawing at with your unwashed hands, and your miserable lives as well."

languages.text: «Se halla en presencia {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán {name} von Valancius, {mf|señor|señora} de este navío y de todo cuanto hay en él, incluidos esos artículos que está manoseando con sus dedos mugrientos, por no mencionar sus miserables vidas».
languages.original_text: "Before you stands Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel and everything on it, including those goods you are pawing at with your unwashed hands, and your miserable lives as well."

traits.locale_text: «Se halla en presencia {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán {name} von Valancius, {mf|señor|señora} de este navío y de todo cuanto hay en él, incluidos esos artículos que está manoseando con sus dedos mugrientos, por no mencionar sus miserables vidas».

languages.text: 「諸君の前にはこの船のロード・キャプテン、{name}フォン・ヴァランシウスが立っている。この船とそこにあるすべてのもの、諸君が洗っていない手でつついている品々、そして諸君の惨めな命も含めてロード・キャプテンのものである」
languages.original_text: "Before you stands Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel and everything on it, including those goods you are pawing at with your unwashed hands, and your miserable lives as well."

traits.locale_text: 「諸君の前にはこの船のロード・キャプテン、{name}フォン・ヴァランシウスが立っている。この船とそこにあるすべてのもの、諸君が洗っていない手でつついている品々、そして諸君の惨めな命も含めてロード・キャプテンのものである」

languages.text: “站在你们面前的是这艘船的主人，领主舰长{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。这艘船的一切都属于{mf|他|她}，无论是你们的脏爪子摸着的武器，还是你们不值一提的性命。”
languages.original_text: "Before you stands Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel and everything on it, including those goods you are pawing at with your unwashed hands, and your miserable lives as well."

traits.locale_text: “站在你们面前的是这艘船的主人，领主舰长{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。这艘船的一切都属于{mf|他|她}，无论是你们的脏爪子摸着的武器，还是你们不值一提的性命。”

languages.text: "Vor euch steht Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|Meister|Meisterin} dieses Schiffes und aller seiner Bewohner, einschließlich der Waren, an die ihr eure ungewaschene Hand anlegt und eurer armseligen Leben."
languages.original_text: "Before you stands Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel and everything on it, including those goods you are pawing at with your unwashed hands, and your miserable lives as well."

traits.locale_text: "Vor euch steht Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|Meister|Meisterin} dieses Schiffes und aller seiner Bewohner, einschließlich der Waren, an die ihr eure ungewaschene Hand anlegt und eurer armseligen Leben."

languages.text: « Devant vous se tient {name} von Valancius, {mf|maître|maîtresse} de ce vaisseau et de tout ce qui se trouve à son bord, à commencer par les marchandises sur lesquelles vous cherchez à mettre vos sales pattes, de même que vos misérables vies. »
languages.original_text: "Before you stands Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel and everything on it, including those goods you are pawing at with your unwashed hands, and your miserable lives as well."

traits.locale_text: « Devant vous se tient {name} von Valancius, {mf|maître|maîtresse} de ce vaisseau et de tout ce qui se trouve à son bord, à commencer par les marchandises sur lesquelles vous cherchez à mettre vos sales pattes, de même que vos misérables vies. »

languages.text: "Karşınızda bu geminin, leş gibi ellerinizi sürdüğünüz o mallar da dâhil olmak üzere gemi içindeki her şeyin ve hatta o acınası hayatlarınızın da sahibi olan Lord Kaptan {name} von Valancius duruyor."
languages.original_text: "Before you stands Lord Captain {name} von Valancius, {mf|master|mistress} of this vessel and everything on it, including those goods you are pawing at with your unwashed hands, and your miserable lives as well."
